```{r}
#| label: common
#| include: false

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, rmarkdown, here, knitr, webshot, tadr, tidytext, webshot, DT, readtext) # default packages

ggplot2::theme_set(ggplot2::theme_minimal()) # set default ggplot2 theme

filter <- dplyr::filter # avoid conflict with `stats` package

options(digits = 3) # default to 3 decimal places

options(knitr.table.format = function() {
  if (knitr::is_latex_output())
    "latex" else "pipe"
})

# Adjust linewidth
hook_output = knit_hooks$get('output')
knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options) {
  # this hook is used only when the linewidth option is not NULL
  if (!is.null(n <- options$linewidth)) {
    x = knitr:::split_lines(x)
    # any lines wider than n should be wrapped
    x = strwrap(x, width = n)
    x = paste(x, collapse = '\n')
  }
  hook_output(x, options)
})
```
